content:
Could everyone at the MRC, who hasn't done so yet, send me email tentatively associating with one of our 5 subgroups, please?
By Monday morning in CA, please.

The subgroups are:

  1. Dial and Games, @Jérémie Koenig , @Jan Rooduijn
  2. Dial and Poly, @Nelson Niu , @Joseph Dorta
  3. Dial and Lenses, @Bruno Gavranovic, @Matteo Capucci (he/him)
  4. Dial implementations, @Eric Bond
  5. Dial Petri nets, @Charlotte Aten
    The subgroups have lots of overlap amongst themselves and the assignments are only tentative, as amply discussed before.
    but maths is better in groups of 2 or 3 than in bigger groups.

I'd like us to arrive in BH with 4 questions from each subgroup that we think we may be able to answer.
I also would like subgroups to decide on only TWO references that are the most essential reading for everyone, if possible.

Thanks!
